channel.title: Jo Liss / @jo_liss
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @jo_liss. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @jo_liss: I wish I could say “happy pride” this month but honestly there is nothing happy about it. the amount of anti-trans legislation and the overturning overturning of roe v wade - we need gay wrath way more than we need gay pride right now
item.dc:creator: @torturecrush
item.description: I wish I could say “happy pride” this month but honestly there is nothing happy about it. the amount of anti-trans legislation and the overturning overturning of roe v wade - we need gay wrath way more than we need gay pride right now

item.title: R to @jo_liss: It's open beta now, so you should be able to just sign up and toy around with it.
item.dc:creator: @jo_liss
item.description: It's open beta now, so you should be able to just sign up and toy around with it.

item.title:
I know I'm like half a year late, but OpenAI's beta is just so delightful. I just got the model to sass me!
(White background is input, green background is completion produced by the model.)
item.dc:creator: @jo_liss
item.description:

item.title: R to @dgeb: Ooooh this sounds v interesting. Will there be a recording of this talk?

item.title: R to @zkat__: fnm has worked well for me. Added bonus that it doesn't slow down your shell startup. https://github.com/Schniz/fnm
item.dc:creator: @jo_liss
item.description: fnm has worked well for me. Added bonus that it doesn't slow down your shell startup. github.com/Schniz/fnm

item.title:
RT by @jo_liss: Here’s how we do it: Most ad exchanges have a list of prohibited content written into their legal agreements with advertisers. No lies. No misleading narratives. No promotion of violence.
It’s prohibited for a reason: advertisers don’t want to fund toxic content.
item.dc:creator: @CheckMyAdsHQ
item.description:
Here’s how we do it: Most ad exchanges have a list of prohibited content written into their legal agreements with advertisers. No lies. No misleading narratives. No promotion of violence.

It’s prohibited for a reason: advertisers don’t want to fund toxic content.

item.title:
RT by @jo_liss: Starting today, we’re taking on http://FoxNews.com, the permanent home of Fox’s lies — where they are subject to the standards written by the ad industry.
We’ve used these standards to get @dbongino and Steve Bannon kicked off the ad exchanges.
Fox is next.
item.dc:creator: @CheckMyAdsHQ
item.description:
Starting today, we’re taking on FoxNews.com, the permanent home of Fox’s lies — where they are subject to the standards written by the ad industry.

We’ve used these standards to get @dbongino and Steve Bannon kicked off the ad exchanges.

Fox is next.

item.title:
RT by @jo_liss: Fox News is more fragile than you think. Together we can pressure the ad industry to drop Fox News because of their support of the Jan. 6 insurrection.
And we have proof that it works.
Join us: http://checkmyads.org/fox
item.dc:creator: @CheckMyAdsHQ
item.description:
Fox News is more fragile than you think. Together we can pressure the ad industry to drop Fox News because of their support of the Jan. 6 insurrection.

And we have proof that it works.

Join us:
checkmyads.org/fox

item.title:
RT by @jo_liss: PAX East had a death in their enforcer team last week
CHI has had a huge boom of attendees with positive reports this week.
Today another Rust conference announced an in-person event.
Seems like a good idea to re-up this very good and spicy take:
item.dc:creator: @bitshiftmask

item.title: R to @jesslynnrose: This is the glory we all should aspire to.
item.dc:creator: @jo_liss
item.description: This is the glory we all should aspire to.

item.title: RT by @jo_liss: Now. Shenzhen population- 17m Total COVID cases- 982, 3 deaths. Total lockdown time in 2 years- one week. No mass deaths. No long COVID. No kids with hepatitis and other emerging long term complications. We "live with" COVID just fine. You were sacrificed.
item.dc:creator: @RealSexyCyborg
item.description:
Now.
Shenzhen population- 17m
Total COVID cases- 982, 3 deaths.
Total lockdown time in 2 years- one week.
No mass deaths.
No long COVID.
No kids with hepatitis and other emerging long term complications.
We "live with" COVID just fine. You were sacrificed.

item.title: RT by @jo_liss: Instead of attacking someone for trying to build a perpetual motion machine that also kills puppies, why not provide constructive criticism? Ideas start somewhere. The details get ironed out as it progresses from idea to reality.
item.dc:creator: @molly0xFFF
item.description: Instead of attacking someone for trying to build a perpetual motion machine that also kills puppies, why not provide constructive criticism? Ideas start somewhere. The details get ironed out as it progresses from idea to reality.

item.title: RT by @jo_liss: UK based EU citizens: make sure your voice is heard! We won’t be allowed to vote in General Elections so make this vote count. Please use your right. @the3million
item.dc:creator: @TitiaRijpma
item.description:

item.title: Has web development gone too far
